name: Pop Quiz
oracle_text:
Draw a card.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

name: Pest Summoning
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 black and green Pest creature tokens with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
flavor_text:
"Step 1: Put the pests in mud.
"Step 2: Wait."
—*Gyome's Guide to Pest Breeding*

name: Confront the Past
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Return target planeswalker card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• Remove twice X loyalty counters from target planeswalker an opponent controls.
flavor_text: "Why, Gideon? Of all people, why save me?"

name: Eager First-Year
oracle_text: Magecraft - Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Eager First-Year gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Today, she learns the basics. She'll knock out advanced theory later this week.

name: Archmage Emeritus
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, draw a card.
flavor_text: Some emeritus professors return from their wanderings periodically to share tales of the mystical wonders of Arcavios.

name: Archmage Emeritus
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, draw a card.
flavor_text: Some emeritus professors return from their wanderings periodically to share tales of the mystical wonders of Arcavios.

name: Dragonsguard Elite
oracle_text:
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Dragonsguard Elite.
{4}{G}{G}: Double the number of +1/+1 counters on Dragonsguard Elite.

name: Dragonsguard Elite
oracle_text:
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Dragonsguard Elite.
{4}{G}{G}: Double the number of +1/+1 counters on Dragonsguard Elite.
flavor_text: "The Founder Dragons brought the Blood Age to an end. It is an honor to serve them."

name: Professor Onyx
oracle_text:
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
+1: You lose 1 life. Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
−3: Each opponent sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures that player controls.
−8: Each opponent may discard a card. If they don't, they lose 3 life. Repeat this process six more times.

name: Rowan, Scholar of Sparks // Will, Scholar of Frost
type_line: Legendary Planeswalker — Rowan // Legendary Planeswalker — Will

card_faces.name: Rowan, Scholar of Sparks
card_faces.oracle_text:
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
+1: Rowan, Scholar of Sparks deals 1 damage to each opponent. If you've drawn three or more cards this turn, she deals 3 damage to each opponent instead.
−4: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {2}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy."

card_faces.name: Will, Scholar of Frost
card_faces.oracle_text:
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
+1: Up to one target creature has base power and toughness 0/2 until your next turn.
−3: Draw two cards.
−7: Exile up to five target permanents. For each permanent exiled this way, its controller creates a 4/4 blue and red Elemental Creature token.

name: Whirlwind Denial
oracle_text: For each spell and ability your opponents control, counter it unless its controller pays {4}.
flavor_text:
"If they try to storm your palace, you must become the storm."
—*Handbook of Imperial Spellcraft*

name: Krosan Grip
oracle_text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"On a world where time was torn asunder, destruction ruled the minds of all."
—Multiversal Metahistories

name: Urza's Rage
oracle_text:
Kicker {8}{R} (You may pay an additional {8}{R} as you cast this spell.)
This spell can't be countered.
Urza's Rage deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, instead it deals 10 damage to that permanent or player and the damage can't be prevented.

name: Growth Spiral
oracle_text: Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"I've gleaned greater insight from the spiraling of a single fern than I have from all the books I've ever read."
—Kianne, Quandrix dean

name: Cultivate
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text:
"You'd be amazed how much a single plant has to teach oyu."
—Lisette, Witherbloom dean

name: Weather the Storm
oracle_text:
You gain 3 life.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)
flavor_text:
"Neither blade nor tempest can assail the serenity of a tranquil mind."
—_The Turrau Carvings_

name: Dark Ritual
oracle_text: Add {B}{B}{B}.
flavor_text:
"They distrust my methods, but when they want results, whom do you think they seek?"
—Incantations of Lim-Dûl

name: Inquisition of Kozilek
oracle_text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it with converted mana cost 3 or less. That player discards that card.

name: Village Rites
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"My colleagues revile the barbarity of the Blood Age, but I believe we have much to learn from the magics of endless war."
—Embrose, Silverquill dean

name: Mind's Desire
oracle_text:
Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.)
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

name: Defiant Strike
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"For twelve days and twelve nights, Somat assailed the monster's shell. On the thirteenth morning, it cracked with the dawn."
—_Heroics: A Book of Fables_

name: Ephemerate
oracle_text:
Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Putrefy
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"From monarch to mulch as quick as could be."
—_The Dethroner's Grimoire_

name: Harmonize
oracle_text: Draw three cards.
flavor_text:
"The bloody din of invasion faded
And silent song rang through the woods again."
—"Song of Freyalise"
